title: Get RELATIONSHIP by ID
user_story:
As an API consumer\
I want to be able to fetch a specific relationship for which I only know its ID\
So I can find out more about the relationship and its connected nodes
description:
* The relationship is returned when it actually exists. → Status Code \`200\`
* The response contains the relationship ID, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. Invalid means that there exists no node with the given ID. → Status Code \`404\`
